verses.roman:
mleccha kahe,--yei kaha, sei 'satya' haya
śāstre likhiyāche, keha la-ite nā pāraya

synonyms: mleccha kahe—the Mohammedan replied; yei kaha—what You say; sei—that; satya haya—is true; śāstre—in the Koran; likhiyāche—it has been written; keha—anyone; la-ite—to take; nā pāraya—is not able.
translation: The saintly Mohammedan replied, "All that You have said is true. This has certainly been written in the Koran, but our scholars can neither understand nor accept it.
